issue.title: Type traits implementation latitude should be removed for C++0x

discussion.p: 20.4.9 [lib.meta.req], Implementation requirements, provides latitude for type traits implementers that is not needed in C++0x. It includes the wording:

blockquote.p: [Note: the latitude granted to implementers in this clause is temporary, and is expected to be removed in future revisions of this document. -- end note]

discussion.p: Note: N2157: Minor Modifications to the type traits Wording also has the intent of removing this wording from the WP.

resolution.p: Remove 20.4.9 [lib.meta.req] in its entirety from the WP.
resolution.note: post-Oxford: Recommend NAD Editorial. This resolution is now in the current working draft.
